main_definition: (personal) Me and at least one other person; the objective case of we.

meanings_and_examples.definition: (personal) Me and at least one other person; the objective case of we.
meanings_and_examples.example: Let's go to the movies with John and watch a comedy film together.
Give us a look at your paper.
We'll have to throw us food out.
Could you do that for us?
